datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard include criteria on a modular design of the product?
Does the standard include criteria on a take back system for the product?
Does the standard include criteria on an additional lifetime guarantee for the product beyond the legal obligations?
Does the standard include criteria on biological control to prevent or suppress harmful organisms?
Does the standard include criteria on H statements H300, H310, H330, H340, H341, H350, H351, H360, H361, H370, H371?
Does the standard include criteria on H statements H400, H410, H411?
Does the standard include criteria on clear coding of used materials?
Does the standard require that (at least) compliance with all ILO core labour standards are verified by a third party?
Does the standard include criteria on conflict minerals?
Does the standard include criteria on disassembly of the product for recycling?
Does the standard include criteria on energy consumption in the production phase?
Does the standard include criteria on environmental management instruments like EMAS or ISO 14001?
Does the standard include criteria on environmental responsible mining practices?
Does the standard include criteria on expansion facilities of the product?
Does the standard include criteria on F-GHG emissions?
Does the standard prohibit forced and compulsory labour as defined in ILO 105?
Does the standard include criteria on H statements H340, H341, H350, H351, H360, H361?
Does the standard include criteria on noise emissions during the use phase?
Does the standard include criteria on synthetic fertilizers?
Does the standard include criteria on power consumption and power management (during the use phase)?
Does the standard include criteria on properties of the battery?
Does the standard include criteria on providing information concerning possible power savings to the user?
Does the standard include criteria on providing information concerning reparability, upgradeability and usage of the battery to the user?
Does the standard include requirements to train workers on labour rights?
Does the standard include requirements on setting up policies or procedures to manage basic labour rights in the workplace?
Does the standard include criteria on testing the final product regarding residues of chemicals?
Does the standard include criteria on the availability of spare parts for the product?
Does the standard include criteria on biodegradability of substances?
Does the standard include criteria on regularly monitoring harmful organisms by observations in the field or warning, forecasting and early diagnosis systems (e.g. traps)
Does the standard include criteria on the principle to use pesticides as last resort only?
Does the standard include criteria on the production of natural fibres?
Does the standard include criteria on the production of synthetic fibers?
Does the standard include criteria on the quality / durability of specific components?
Does the standard include criteria on the recyclability of plastics used?
Does the standard include criteria on the usage of recycled material?
Does the standard include criteria on the usage of renewable energy in the production phase of the hardware?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of azo dyes that may cleave aromatic amines which are harmful to human health?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of biocides in the finishing process?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of chlorine gas, elemental chlorine, chloroorganic compounds as bleaching agent?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of dyes or pigments based on lead copper, chromium, nickel, cadmium and aluminum?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of flame retardants?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of formaldehyde?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of mercury, cadmium, lead, chromium VI?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of nanomaterials?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of plasticizers with adverse environmental and health impact?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of polymers containing halogens?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of postconsumer recycled content in the product?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of recycled material in the packaging?
Does the standard include criteria on synthetic pesticides?
Does the standard include criteria on the use of wooden fibres?
